class.name: Steamworks
class.brief_description: Base singleton to interact with the Steamworks API.

method.name: get_last_error
method.description: Returns the last error that ocurred.

method.name: init
method.description:
Initializes Steamworks with the given App ID. Initializes Steam Input, if [param run_callbacks_automatically] is [code]true[/code] then you don't have to call [method run_callbacks] manually.
Returns [code]true[/code] if initialization was successful.

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if Steamworks was initialized properly.

method.name: run_callbacks
method.description: Dispatches callbacks and call results to all of the connected signals.
